description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers

The beauty of the brownstone / apt.

The entire 1st floor ( following rules of the home).

As often as they would respectfully need

Beautiful historic quiet neighborhood.

Convenient to public transportation and Barclays Center.

King size bed
name: Charming Garden Studio, close to Manhattan
review: Exelent location outside of the city, little bit far but close to the metro. The apt? Incredible, clean and super safe. The furnitures out of time exelent preserve.  Latasha is a great host and really hospitality person. We have a great time in his apt! we hope to comeback some day!
